rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with adequate reception area.
Lively living space with Vastu compliant placement and balanced energy flow.
Functionally designed kitchen with modern amenities placed in an east-west zone.
South facing bedroom with spacious balcony for natural light and air.
North-west facing bedroom with a balcony enhancing the Vastu and aesthetic balance.
Functional bathroom designed for privacy and ease of maintenance.

additional_features.description: Integrated home theater system in the living area with acoustically treated space.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a well-appointed balcony, designed for optimal relaxation and privacy.
Secondary bedroom suite with a balcony oriented to enhance natural light.
Dedicated home office space, aligned with Vastu principles for productivity and calm.
En-suite bathroom for the master bedroom suite.

additional_features.description: A private roof deck accessible from the master bedroom for relaxation and social gatherings.

rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area merging dining and entertainment zones with a modern colonial aesthetic.
Exclusive home theater designed for immersive viewing experience, aligned with the design ethos of the pad.

additional_features.description: Each bedroom is complemented by a generous balcony designed with Vastu principles to maximize light and positive energy.
Architectural features include decorative balconies, pitched roofs, and period-appropriate detailing.
